events.name: Saturday early bird brunch in Grünewald
events.description: Saturday breakfast in European style for true connoisseurs, that is with a glass of champagne

events.name: Wine Soiree on the Fernsehturm
events.description: Spend a perfect evening in the company of your loved one with a glass of fine wine and a breathtaking view of the city

events.name: Encore Night Boat Party
events.description: Who is ready to party? I mean in the middle of the water, a boat with good music and drinks. If thats you then you have made it to the right place.

events.name: Panacotta Sunday
events.description: The most famous Italian pastry chef will give you a unique master class on how to make the most delicate and fluffy dessert. Enjoy the relaxing atmosphere of a cozy kitchen and make the best panacotta of your life with a glass of Prosecco

events.name: Beefsteak Festival
events.description: Learn how to make the juiciest steak of your life! Chef Hassan Hasir will tell you all the ins and outs of how to make this dish unforgettable and share his secrets

events.name: Soul Kitchen Vegan Party
events.description: Dope party which vegan soul kitchen legends, fresh ingredients and friendly ambiente
